name: Introduction to Linguistics
description: An introduction to the discipline of linguistics, with a focus on language structure and use.

name: Introduction to Psycholinguistics
description: An introduction to the study of psycholinguistics, including the physiology of language, language acquisition, and language processing.

name: Phonology and Morphology
description: A study of the structure and sound systems of language, as well as the internal structure of words.

name: Syntax and Semantics
description: A study of the structure and meaning of language, including sentence structure, sentence meaning, and the meaning of words.

name: Psycholinguistics
description: A study of psychological and neurological aspects of language processing, including language acquisition, language production, and language comprehension.
